8001.en:
<voice 00025_00008001><start_lip_sync n00898 _normal m00001>Oh! You are going to listen? Then let
me tell you a story.<stop_lip_animation n00898 CLOSE_MOUTH>
8001.ja:
<voice 00025_00008001><start_lip_sync n00898 _normal m00001>「おお！　聞いていかれますか。
　では　お話ししましょう。<stop_lip_animation n00898 CLOSE_MOUTH>
8001.ko:
<voice 00025_00008001><start_lip_sync n00898 _normal m00001>: 오오! 듣고 가시겠습니까?
　그럼 이야기해 드리죠.<stop_lip_animation n00898 CLOSE_MOUTH>
8001.zh-Hans:
<voice 00025_00008001><start_lip_sync n00898 _normal m00001>哦哦！你想知道
我就告诉你好了。<stop_lip_animation n00898 CLOSE_MOUTH>
8001.zh-Hant:
<voice 00025_00008001><start_lip_sync n00898 _normal m00001>喔！你願意聽嗎？
那我就跟你說。<stop_lip_animation n00898 CLOSE_MOUTH>

8002.en:
<voice 00105_00008002><start_lip_sync n00898 _normal m00001>Lendersia is the name of a place in
the center of the world that refers to
the entire region.<stop_lip_animation n00898 CLOSE_MOUTH>
8002.ja:
<voice 00105_00008002><start_lip_sync n00898 _normal m00001>「レンダーシアとは　世界の中心にあり
　その地域一帯を指す　地名です。<stop_lip_animation n00898 CLOSE_MOUTH>
8002.ko:
<voice 00105_00008002><start_lip_sync n00898 _normal m00001>: 렌더시아는 세계의 중심에 있는
　지역 일대를 이르는 지명입니다.<stop_lip_animation n00898 CLOSE_MOUTH>
8002.zh-Hans:
<voice 00105_00008002><start_lip_sync n00898 _normal m00001>冷达西亚是个地名，
指的是位于世界中心的区域。<stop_lip_animation n00898 CLOSE_MOUTH>
8002.zh-Hant:
<voice 00105_00008002><start_lip_sync n00898 _normal m00001>冷達西亞是位於
世界中心地域一帶的地名。<stop_lip_animation n00898 CLOSE_MOUTH>

8003.en:
<voice 00145_00008003><start_lip_sync n00898 _normal m00001>It is surrounded by the sea, so it is
not possible to go there on foot.<stop_lip_animation n00898 CLOSE_MOUTH>
8003.ja:
<voice 00145_00008003><start_lip_sync n00898 _normal m00001>「周囲は　海に囲まれているため
　徒歩で向かうことは　できません。<stop_lip_animation n00898 CLOSE_MOUTH>
8003.ko:
<voice 00145_00008003><start_lip_sync n00898 _normal m00001>: 주위가 바다로 둘러싸여 있기 때문에
　걸어서는 갈 수 없지요.<stop_lip_animation n00898 CLOSE_MOUTH>
8003.zh-Hans:
<voice 00145_00008003><start_lip_sync n00898 _normal m00001>周围被大海环绕，
步行是无法前往的。<stop_lip_animation n00898 CLOSE_MOUTH>
8003.zh-Hant:
<voice 00145_00008003><start_lip_sync n00898 _normal m00001>四周被大海包圍，
所以無法步行前往。<stop_lip_animation n00898 CLOSE_MOUTH>

8004.en:
There is only one way to get to Lendersia. There is only one way to get to Lendersia, and that is by
crossing the sea on the Grand Titus, the pride of this port city.
8004.ja:
<voice 00185_00008004><start_lip_sync n00898 _normal m00001>「レンダーシアに行く方法は　ひとつだけ。
　この港町が誇る　グランドタイタス号に乗って
　海を越えていくしかありません。<stop_lip_animation n00898 CLOSE_MOUTH>
8004.ko:
<voice 00185_00008004><start_lip_sync n00898 _normal m00001>: 렌더시아로 가는 방법은 하나뿐입니다.
　이 항구 마을의 자랑인 그랜드 타이터스호를
　타고 바다를 건너서 가는 수밖에 없어요.<stop_lip_animation n00898 CLOSE_MOUTH>
8004.zh-Hans:
<voice 00185_00008004><start_lip_sync n00898 _normal m00001>到冷达西亚去的办法只有一个，
那就是乘坐这个港口镇
引以为傲的大巨人号渡海前往。<stop_lip_animation n00898 CLOSE_MOUTH>
8004.zh-Hant:
<voice 00185_00008004><start_lip_sync n00898 _normal m00001>前往冷達西亞的方法只有一個，
就是搭乘這座港都引以為傲的
大巨人號渡海前去。<stop_lip_animation n00898 CLOSE_MOUTH>

8005.en:
<voice 00250_00008005><start_lip_sync n00898 _normal m00001>There is also a castle in Lendersia
called Gran Zedora, but this is just a
rumor.<stop_lip_animation n00898 CLOSE_MOUTH>
8005.ja:
<voice 00250_00008005><start_lip_sync n00898 _normal m00001>「また　レンダーシアには
　グランゼドーラという城が　ありまして
　これは　うわさなんですが……。<stop_lip_animation n00898 CLOSE_MOUTH>
8005.ko:
<voice 00250_00008005><start_lip_sync n00898 _normal m00001>: 또 렌더시아에는
　그랑제도라라는 성이 있는데
　이건 소문이긴 하지만…….<stop_lip_animation n00898 CLOSE_MOUTH>
8005.zh-Hans:
<voice 00250_00008005><start_lip_sync n00898 _normal m00001>另外，
冷达西亚那里有一座古兰泽朵拉城。
关于它，存在着很多谣传……<stop_lip_animation n00898 CLOSE_MOUTH>
8005.zh-Hant:
<voice 00250_00008005><start_lip_sync n00898 _normal m00001>此外，冷達西亞有個
叫做古蘭澤朵拉的城，
雖然這只是我聽說的……<stop_lip_animation n00898 CLOSE_MOUTH>

8006.en:
<voice 00280_00008006><start_lip_sync n00898 _normal m00001>I've heard that the royal family has a
special bloodline. I'd like to meet
him.<stop_lip_animation n00898 CLOSE_MOUTH>
8006.ja:
<voice 00280_00008006><start_lip_sync n00898 _normal m00001>「なんでも　その王家の者は
　特別な血筋を　受け継いでいるとのことです。
　一度　お目にかかりたいものですね。<stop_lip_animation n00898 CLOSE_MOUTH>
8006.ko:
<voice 00280_00008006><start_lip_sync n00898 _normal m00001>: 글쎄, 그 왕가 사람들은
　특별한 혈통을 계승했다더라고요.
　한 번쯤 만나뵙고 싶네요.<stop_lip_animation n00898 CLOSE_MOUTH>
8006.zh-Hans:
<voice 00280_00008006><start_lip_sync n00898 _normal m00001>据说那里的王族继承了很特殊的血脉。
真想亲眼去看看啊。<stop_lip_animation n00898 CLOSE_MOUTH>
8006.zh-Hant:
<voice 00280_00008006><start_lip_sync n00898 _normal m00001>只要是王家的人，
都繼承著特別的血脈。
真想親眼看看呢。<stop_lip_animation n00898 CLOSE_MOUTH>

8007.en:
<voice 00060_00008007><start_lip_sync n00897 _normal m00001>Oh my, you are a very cute child, aren't you. My
name is Sugimu. I'm in charge of the Ship Bureau.<stop_lip_animation n00897 CLOSE_MOUTH>
8007.ja:
<voice 00060_00008007><start_lip_sync n00897 _normal m00001>「あらん　ずいぶん　かわいい子ねん。
　あたしは　スギムっていうの。
　船舶管理局の責任者よん。<stop_lip_animation n00897 CLOSE_MOUTH>
8007.ko:
<voice 00060_00008007><start_lip_sync n00897 _normal m00001>: 어머나, 아주 귀여운 아이네.
　난 스기무라고 해.
　선박 관리국의 책임자란다.<stop_lip_animation n00897 CLOSE_MOUTH>
8007.zh-Hans:
<voice 00060_00008007><start_lip_sync n00897 _normal m00001>哟，你长得好可爱。
我是斯基姆，
船舶管理局的负责人。<stop_lip_animation n00897 CLOSE_MOUTH>
8007.zh-Hant:
<voice 00060_00008007><start_lip_sync n00897 _normal m00001>喔？真是個可愛的人兒。
我叫斯基姆。
我是船舶管理局的負責人喔。<stop_lip_animation n00897 CLOSE_MOUTH>

8008.en:
<voice 00100_00008008><start_lip_sync n00897 _normal m00001>I know what you want to hear. You want
to know when we can leave.<stop_lip_animation n00897 CLOSE_MOUTH>
8008.ja:
<voice 00100_00008008><start_lip_sync n00897 _normal m00001>「あなたの聞きたいことは　わかってるわ。
　いつ出港できるか　知りたいのね。<stop_lip_animation n00897 CLOSE_MOUTH>
8008.ko:
<voice 00100_00008008><start_lip_sync n00897 _normal m00001>: 뭘 물어보려는 건지 알아.
　언제 출항할 수 있는지 궁금하구나?<stop_lip_animation n00897 CLOSE_MOUTH>
8008.zh-Hans:
<voice 00100_00008008><start_lip_sync n00897 _normal m00001>我知道你想问的事。
你是想知道船什么时候可以起航吧？<stop_lip_animation n00897 CLOSE_MOUTH>
8008.zh-Hant:
<voice 00100_00008008><start_lip_sync n00897 _normal m00001>我知道你想問的事。
你想知道什麼時候出港吧。<stop_lip_animation n00897 CLOSE_MOUTH>

8009.en:
The purple fog that envelops the continent has not disappeared, which is a bit disconcerting, but the waters
around Lendersia have calmed down.
8009.ja:
<voice 00190_00008009><start_lip_sync n00897 _normal m00001>「……大陸を包む　紫の霧が消えないのは
　ちょっと　気がかりだけど　
　レンダーシアの近海は　おだやかになったの。<stop_lip_animation n00897 CLOSE_MOUTH>
8009.ko:
<voice 00190_00008009><start_lip_sync n00897 _normal m00001>: ……대륙을 감싼 보랏빛 안개가 사라지지
　않는 건 조금 마음에 걸리지만
　렌더시아 앞바다는 잠잠해졌어.<stop_lip_animation n00897 CLOSE_MOUTH>
8009.zh-Hans:
<voice 00190_00008009><start_lip_sync n00897 _normal m00001>……虽然我有点担心包围大陆的
那些散不尽的紫色烟雾，但是
冷达西亚的近海是很安稳的。<stop_lip_animation n00897 CLOSE_MOUTH>
8009.zh-Hant:
<voice 00190_00008009><start_lip_sync n00897 _normal m00001>……雖然包圍著冷達西亞的紫霧
還沒退去讓人有些在意，
不過附近的海域平靜了不少。<stop_lip_animation n00897 CLOSE_MOUTH>

8010.en:
<voice 00230_00008010><start_lip_sync n00897 _normal m00001>Once the Grand Titus is repaired, I am
sure we will be able to go back to
Lendersia like before.<stop_lip_animation n00897 CLOSE_MOUTH>
8010.ja:
<voice 00230_00008010><start_lip_sync n00897 _normal m00001>「グランドタイタス号の修理さえ　終われば
　きっと　また以前のように
　レンダーシアに行けるようになるはずよ。<stop_lip_animation n00897 CLOSE_MOUTH>
8010.ko:
<voice 00230_00008010><start_lip_sync n00897 _normal m00001>: 그랜드 타이터스호 수리만 끝나면
　다시 예전처럼
　렌더시아로 갈 수 있게 될 거야.<stop_lip_animation n00897 CLOSE_MOUTH>
8010.zh-Hans:
<voice 00230_00008010><start_lip_sync n00897 _normal m00001>只要大巨人号修理完毕，
就能像以往那样
驶向冷达西亚了。<stop_lip_animation n00897 CLOSE_MOUTH>
8010.zh-Hant:
<voice 00230_00008010><start_lip_sync n00897 _normal m00001>等大巨人號維修結束，
一定又能像以前一樣，
可以去冷達西亞了。<stop_lip_animation n00897 CLOSE_MOUTH>

8011.en:
It is the most glorious moment of Grand Titus when we leave for Lendersia carrying our dreams and
hopes. I can't wait to see that scene again.
8011.ja:
<voice 00275_00008011><start_lip_sync n00897 _normal m00001>「夢と希望を乗せて　レンダーシアに旅立つ時が
　グランドタイタス号の　もっとも輝く瞬間なの。
　また　あの光景が見たいわね……。<stop_lip_animation n00897 CLOSE_MOUTH>
8011.ko:
<voice 00275_00008011><start_lip_sync n00897 _normal m00001>: 꿈과 희망을 싣고 렌더시아를 떠날 때가
　그랜드 타이터스호가 가장 눈부신 순간이지.
　그 광경을 다시 보고 싶어…….<stop_lip_animation n00897 CLOSE_MOUTH>
8011.zh-Hans:
<voice 00275_00008011><start_lip_sync n00897 _normal m00001>承载着希望与梦想驶向冷达西亚的瞬间，
就是大巨人号最光彩耀人的时刻。
我好想再次看到那场面……<stop_lip_animation n00897 CLOSE_MOUTH>
8011.zh-Hant:
<voice 00275_00008011><start_lip_sync n00897 _normal m00001>帶著夢想和希望，啟程前往冷達西亞時，
就是大巨人號最閃閃發亮的瞬間。
我好想再看看那種光景……<stop_lip_animation n00897 CLOSE_MOUTH>

8012.en:
<voice 00370_00008012><start_lip_sync n00897 _normal m00001>We're working hard on repairs for
everyone right now. Please look
forward to the day when we sail.<stop_lip_animation n00897 CLOSE_MOUTH>
8012.ja:
<voice 00370_00008012><start_lip_sync n00897 _normal m00001>「……うふ　今は　みんなのために
　修理を　がんばってるところよ。
　出港する日を　楽しみに待っててね。<stop_lip_animation n00897 CLOSE_MOUTH>
8012.ko:
<voice 00370_00008012><start_lip_sync n00897 _normal m00001>: ……우훗, 지금은 모두를 위해서
　열심히 수리 중이야.
　출항할 그날을 기대해 줘.<stop_lip_animation n00897 CLOSE_MOUTH>
8012.zh-Hans:
<voice 00370_00008012><start_lip_sync n00897 _normal m00001>……呼，现在为了大家，
我正在努力地进行修理。
请你期待出航那一天的到来吧。<stop_lip_animation n00897 CLOSE_MOUTH>
8012.zh-Hant:
<voice 00370_00008012><start_lip_sync n00897 _normal m00001>……呵，現在正在為了大家
努力修理喔。
好好期待出港的那天吧。<stop_lip_animation n00897 CLOSE_MOUTH>
